name: Chinese Pulao Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chinese Pulao Recipe: Sela Rice ½ kg Chicken 300 grams Chopped Garlic 4-5 cloves Carrot (Slice) 1 Capsicum (Slice) 1 Cabbage half Spring Onion 1-2 strands Chicken Cube 1 Crushed Black Pepper 1 tsp Soya Sauce 1 tbsp Chinese Salt 1/3 tsp Clarified Butter or Oil 2-3 tbsp Salt to taste
instructions: Take ½ kg of sela rice clean it, wash it off and soaked for 1-2 hours. Take a cooking pan add 2-3 tbsp of clarified butter or oil, heat it then add 4-5 chopped garlic cloves, 300 grams of chicken, roasted add 1 tbsp of soya sauce,1 carrot (slices), 1 capsicum (slices) and ½ cabbage, mix it well. Now add 1 chicken cube and as required water, ½ kg of soaked sela rice and cook. When the rice is done take it out in a serving platter and garnish with 1-2 strands of spring onion and serve it.
